name: Help the Baby Lite
description:
Help the Baby is one of the most exciting and fun casual games, where the main goal is to take the balloon to the little cute baby. Get ready to play a free casual game, full of challenging levels, obstacles, and achievements!

🎈 TAKE THE BALOON TO THE BABY

In this game, your main goal is to explore and find out the best path so you can safely take the balloon to the baby. The baby is in a playground, waiting for its toy, so you better show your best click skills! Try to be agiler and be careful not to lose, relax and have fun at the same time with this cool free casual game.

❌ BE CAREFUL OF THE OBSTACLES

This awesome game is full of dangerous obstacles that can make you lose, so be aware and master them! Stay away from the lawn, the birds and the stones that the boy shoots through a sling and collect as many candies as you can in order to progress through 18 challenging levels in this LITE version.

👆 COUNT YOUR CLICKS & MAKE HIGH SCORES

In this game you have to carefully take the balloon to the baby by clicking. Save as much clicks as possible, do not spend all the clicks you’re provided with! Take the balloon to the baby before the time runs out and win higher scores by spending the least amount of time. Get a high score and compete with other players from all over the world!

👶 HELP THE BABY FEATURES

✅ Addictive and fun casual game

✅ Beautiful HD graphics

✅ Engaging tunes

✅ Safely take the balloon to the baby

✅ Find out the best path

✅ Collect as many candies as you can

✅ Save as much clicks as possible

✅ Be agile and spend the least amount of time

✅ Master the obstacles

✅ Stay away from the lawn, the birds and the stones that the boy shoots through a sling

✅ Do not spend all the clicks

✅ Take the balloon to the baby before the time runs out

✅ Make high scores

✅ 18 challenging levels in this LITE version

✅ FREE baby game

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Can you help the baby get the toy?
